mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sign_return ( new_waybill_code, busi_id, busi_name, return_cycle, operate_time, org_id, operate_user, merge_count,yn) VALUES ( #{newWaybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mergeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},1)
mapper.select: SELECT id, new_waybill_code, busi_id, busi_name, return_cycle, operate_time, org_id, operate_user, merge_count,yn FROM sign_return WHERE yn = 1 AND new_waybill_code = #{newWaybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, new_waybill_code, busi_id, busi_name, return_cycle, operate_time, org_id, operate_user, merge_count,yn FROM sign_return WHERE yn = 1 AND id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} LIMIT 1
